environment._instruction: Add the computational environment in which this computation was executed.

launchConfiguration._instruction: Add the launch configuration of this computation (e.g., command-line arguments).

recipe._instruction: Add the workflow recipe version used for this computation.

resourceUsage._instruction: Enter all resources used during this computation (e.g., core-hours or energy).

startedBy._instruction: Add the agent that started this computation.

status._instruction: Enter the current status of this computation.

tag._instruction: Enter any custom tags for this computation.

technique._instruction: Add all analysis techniques that were used in this computation.

wasInformedBy._instruction: Add another computation that sent data to this one during runtime.
